name: Ancient Wars: Sparta
description:
Ancient Wars: Sparta is a strategy game developed by World Forge. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Playlogic Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Ancient Wars: Sparta is available on PC.
It was produced by Jochen Hamma, Michael Hengst and Torsten Hess. It was directed by Vladimir Nikolaev. It was scored by Dynamedion.
